function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of functioning restrooms in parks","Impact":"Spread of contagious diseases due to unsanitary conditions","Mitigation":"Regular inspection and maintenance of restroom facilities","Technologies":"Smart restroom monitoring systems","People":"Park visitors, local residents","Owner":"Park authorities, local municipalities"},{"Description":"Violation of curfews and pandemic restrictions","Impact":"Increased risk of virus transmission due to non-compliance with regulations","Mitigation":"Enforcement of curfews and restrictions, public awareness campaigns","Technologies":"Surveillance systems, public communication platforms","People":"General public","Owner":"Law enforcement agencies, government authorities"}]}
